parameters.query: =SELECT i.id, i.tenant_id, i.client_final_id, i.type, i.numero_facture, i.date_facture, i.date_echeance, i.montant_ht, i.montant_ttc, i.tva_taux, i.description, i.mode_paiement, i.statut, i.lien_pdf, i.id_externe_paiement, i.created_at, i.updated_at, cf.nom as client_nom, cf.prenom as client_prenom, cf.email as client_email, cf.telephone as client_telephone, cf.raison_sociale as client_raison_sociale FROM invoices i LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON i.client_final_id = cf.id WHERE i.id = '{{ $json.invoiceId }}' AND i.tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}'
=SELECT id, invoice_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre FROM invoice_lines WHERE invoice_id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.invoiceId }}' ORDER BY ordre ASC
